=====================================
Movie generator
=====================================
This program allows you to add, delete and list movies in a register.
The movies are NOT stored persistent which means that every time when the program is re-sterted you have to add the movies again.

Two default movies are always in list when starting up the program.

=====================================
Run program
=====================================
To run program on WindowsXP:
1. In start menu, choose Accessories.
2. Choose command prompt.
3. Navigate to directory where you put MovieGenerator.jar.
4. Type: java -jar "MovieGenerator.jar"
